mapper.sql: A.ATCL_SN as atclSn , A.BBS_CD as bbsCd , (SELECT L.MENU_NM FROM tb_org_menu M INNER JOIN tb_org_menu_lang L ON M.ORG_CD = L.ORG_CD AND M.MENU_CD = L.MENU_CD WHERE M.ORG_CD = #{orgCd} AND M.OPTN_CTGR_CD_1 = 'BBS' AND M.OPTN_CTGR_CD_2 = A.BBS_CD AND L.LANG_CD = 'ko') as bbsNm , A.PAR_ATCL_SN as parAtclSn , A.HEAD_CD as headCd , ( SELECT HEAD_NM FROM tb_brd_bbs_head WHERE BBS_CD = A.BBS_CD AND HEAD_CD = A.HEAD_CD ) AS headNm , A.THUMB_FILE_SN as thumbFileSn , A.ATCL_TITLE as atclTitle , A.ATCL_CTS as atclCts , A.CTGR_CD as ctgrCd , REGEXP_REPLACE(A.ATCL_CTS, '<[^>]*>', ' ') AS atclCtsStr , A.ATCL_TAG as atclTag , A.ATCL_LVL as atclLvl , A.ATCL_ODR as atclOdr , A.NOTICE_YN as noticeYn , A.LOCK_YN as lockYn , A.HITS as hits , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_brd_bbs_cmnt WHERE ATCL_SN = A.ATCL_SN) AS cmntCnt , A.EDITOR_YN as editorYn , A.MOBILE_URL as mobileUrl , A.REG_NO as regNo , ( SELECT FN_GET_USER_ID(A.REG_NO) FROM DUAL) AS regId , A.REG_NM as regNm , A.PASSWORD as password , ( SELECT FN_GET_USER_NAME_MNG(A.REG_NO) FROM DUAL) AS regMngNm , A.REG_DTTM as regDttm , A.MOD_NO as modNo , A.MOD_DTTM as modDttm , CASE WHEN A.REG_DTTM >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -1 DAY), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') THEN 'NEW' ELSE '' END AS recently , A.ORIGIN_REG_NO as originRegNo , ( SELECT P.REG_NO FROM tb_brd_bbs_atcl P WHERE P.ATCL_SN = A.PAR_ATCL_SN) AS parRegNo , ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_brd_bbs_atcl C WHERE C.PAR_ATCL_SN = A.ATCL_SN) AS childCnt , ( SELECT COMPANY_NAME FROM tb_brd_bbs_atcl_service B WHERE A.ATCL_SN = B.ATCL_SN AND A.BBS_CD = B.BBS_CD ) AS companyName , A.STAR_SCORE AS starScore , A.CRS_CRE_CD AS crsCreCd , ( SELECT CRS_CRE_NM FROM tb_crs_cre_crs WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = A.CRS_CRE_CD ) AS crsCreNm , ROW_NUMBER() OVER() AS ROWNUM

A.ATCL_SN as atclSn , A.BBS_CD as bbsCd , (SELECT L.MENU_NM FROM tb_org_menu M INNER JOIN tb_org_menu_lang L ON M.ORG_CD = L.ORG_CD AND M.MENU_CD = L.MENU_CD WHERE M.ORG_CD = #{orgCd} AND M.OPTN_CTGR_CD_1 = 'BBS' AND M.OPTN_CTGR_CD_2 = A.BBS_CD AND L.LANG_CD = 'ko') as bbsNm , A.PAR_ATCL_SN as parAtclSn , A.HEAD_CD as headCd , ( SELECT HEAD_NM FROM tb_brd_bbs_head WHERE BBS_CD = A.BBS_CD AND HEAD_CD = A.HEAD_CD ) AS headNm , A.THUMB_FILE_SN as thumbFileSn , A.ATCL_TITLE as atclTitle , A.ATCL_CTS as atclCts , A.CTGR_CD as ctgrCd , A.ATCL_TAG as atclTag , A.ATCL_LVL as atclLvl , A.ATCL_ODR as atclOdr , A.NOTICE_YN as noticeYn , A.LOCK_YN as lockYn , A.HITS as hits , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_brd_bbs_cmnt WHERE ATCL_SN = A.ATCL_SN) AS cmntCnt , A.EDITOR_YN as editorYn , A.MOBILE_URL as mobileUrl , A.REG_NO as regNo , ( SELECT FN_GET_USER_ID(A.REG_NO) FROM DUAL) AS regId , A.REG_NM as regNm , ( SELECT FN_GET_USER_NAME_MNG(A.REG_NO) FROM DUAL) AS regMngNm , A.REG_DTTM as regDttm , A.MOD_NO as modNo , A.MOD_DTTM as modDttm , CASE WHEN A.REG_DTTM >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -1 DAY), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') THEN 'NEW' ELSE '' END AS recently , A.ORIGIN_REG_NO as originRegNo , ( SELECT P.REG_NO FROM tb_brd_bbs_atcl P WHERE P.ATCL_SN = A.PAR_ATCL_SN) AS parRegNo , ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_brd_bbs_atcl C WHERE C.PAR_ATCL_SN = A.ATCL_SN) AS childCnt , ( SELECT COMPANY_NAME FROM tb_brd_bbs_atcl_service B WHERE A.ATCL_SN = B.ATCL_SN AND A.BBS_CD = B.BBS_CD ) AS companyName , A.STAR_SCORE AS starScore , A.CRS_CRE_CD AS crsCreCd , ( SELECT CRS_CRE_NM FROM tb_crs_cre_crs WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = A.CRS_CRE_CD ) AS crsCreNm , ROW_NUMBER() OVER() AS ROWNUM

mapper.select: /* SQL ID : list 설 명 : 게시판 게시물의 전체 목록 */

/* SQL ID : listPageing 설 명 : 게시판 게시물의 페이징 목록 */
ORDER BY ATCLSN DESC

/* SQL ID : listTop 설 명 : 게시판 게시물의 상위 목록 */
SELECT TR.* FROM( SELECT SB.* , ROW_NUMBER() OVER() AS ROWNUM FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX(A IF6_tb_brd_bbs_atcl) */ A.ATCL_SN as atclSn , A.BBS_CD as bbsCd , A.PAR_ATCL_SN as parAtclSn , A.HEAD_CD as headCd , A.THUMB_FILE_SN as thumbFileSn , A.ATCL_TITLE as atclTitle , A.ATCL_CTS as atclCts , A.ATCL_TAG as atclTag , A.ATCL_LVL as atclLvl , A.ATCL_ODR as atclOdr , A.NOTICE_YN as noticeYn , A.LOCK_YN as lockYn , A.HITS as hits , A.STAR_SCORE as starScore , A.EDITOR_YN as editorYn , A.MOBILE_URL as mobileUrl , CASE WHEN A.REG_DTTM >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -1 DAY), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') THEN 'NEW' ELSE '' END AS recently , A.ORIGIN_REG_NO as originRegNo , A.REG_NO as regNo , ( SELECT FN_GET_USER_ID(A.REG_NO) FROM DUAL) AS regId , A.REG_NM regNm , A.REG_DTTM as regDttm , A.MOD_NO as modNo , A.MOD_DTTM as modDttm FROM tb_brd_bbs_atcl A WHERE A.ORG_CD = #{orgCd} AND A.BBS_CD = #{bbsCd} AND A.ATCL_LVL = 0 )SB )TR ORDER BY TR.regDttm DESC LIMIT #{topCnt}

SELECT
,B.SERVICE_REG_NM AS serviceRegNm ,B.SERVICE_PW AS servicePw ,B.SERVICE_EMAIL AS serviceEmail ,B.SERVICE_TEL AS serviceTel ,B.SERVICE_ENABLE_DATE AS serviceEnableDate ,B.SERVICE_ENABLE_TIME AS serviceEnableTime ,B.COMPANY_NAME AS companyName ,B.HOPE_CURRICULUM AS hopeCurriculum FROM tb_brd_bbs_atcl A, tb_brd_bbs_atcl_service B WHERE A.ATCL_SN = B.ATCL_SN AND A.BBS_CD = B.BBS_CD AND A.BBS_CD = #{bbsCd} AND A.ATCL_SN = #{atclSn}
/* SQL ID : selectKey 설 명 : 게시판 게시물의 키 생성 */ SELECT nextval(SQ_BRD_BBS_ATCL) FROM DUAL
mapper.update: /* SQL ID : hitsup 설 명 : 게시판 게시물의 정보 수정 */ UPDATE tb_brd_bbs_atcl SET HITS = HITS + 1 WHERE ATCL_SN = #{atclSn}
